description: What's this bag all about?A rock solid but super lightweight jacket that will protect your Kindle for a lifetime. The Flipster’s slim profile and comfortable hold make protecting your Kindle fun and easy. Its high quality elastic will not sag over time and its discreet but super strong Velcro closure does the job without overdoing it. Dressed in Timbuk2’s signature color, the Flipster’s sophistication and style will grab attention from across the room and the bottom of your bag.
